quotes.quote: Comfort zones are deadly zones because you lose your true potential of what you can be, you start going with the status quo.
Selfishness and self-absorption are deadly charm-exterminators.
The most deadly picture is a picture of nothing at all. The colors are there, but there is no image, nothing.
There is nothing more harrowing than a deadly hush with the feel of a great noise around it.
It is as deadly for a mind to have a system as to have none. Therefore it will have to decide to combine both.
In the natural world, beautiful usually means deadly. Beautiful with a casual demeanor always means deadly.
Deadly emotions, buried alive, never die.
Things omitted are often more deadly than errors committed.
Of all forms of deception self-deception is the most deadly, and of all deceived persons the self-deceived are the least likely to discover the fraud.
Misinterpretation is the most deadly of human sins.
Ignorance and power and pride are a deadly mixture, you know.
Sufficient to say, greed is a deadly deed. You shall not covet your neighbor's goods.
True Love denied or rejected is as deadly as a nuclear missile to the soul.
Our silence is deafening and deadly.
Words could be just as deadly as steel.
Without education we are in a horrible and deadly danger of taking educated people seriously.
The most deadly fruit is borne by the hatred which one grafts on an extinguished friendship.
Despair is deadly sin, but worse, it is mortal folly.
Fear is an insidious and deadly thing. It can warp judgment, freeze reflexes, breed mistakes. Worse, it's contagious.
Arrogance can be deadly.
Procrastination is a deadly weapon of human progress.
Pride is more than the first of the seven deadly sins; it is itself the essence of all sin.
Believing that you are unworthy of love and belonging or that who you are authentically is a sin or is wrong, is deadly.
Most deadly errors arise from obsolete assumptions.
Deadly poisons are concealed under sweet honey.
Complacency is the deadly enemy of spiritual progress. The contented soul is the stagnant soul.
Few things are so deadly as a misguided sense of compassion.
Some people's affability is more deadly than the violence of coarser souls.
Our possessions can be deadly. They can be subtly deadly.
The most deadly combination known to man is low IQ and high testosterone.
The venom clamours of a jealous woman poison more deadly than a mad dog's tooth.
Incessant smiling is one of the deadly tools used by someone whose intent is to make others cry.
Complacency is easy...and it is a deadly foe of spiritual growth.
The most deadly poison of our time is indifference.
